body: This spell functions as the minor creation spell, except the object created is a semi-real phantasm. Any creature that interacts with the object may make a Will save, with success causing the object to cease to exist. A gnome casting this spell may make a Spellcraft check in place of any Craft check required to make a complex item.
description: This spell functions as the minor creation spell, except the object created is a semi-real phantasm.

effects.text: phantasmal, unattended, nonmagical object of nonliving plant matter, up to 1 cu. ft./level
effects.name: Effect

name: Minor Phantom Object
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Gnomes/New Racial Rules/Gnome Spells/Minor Phantom Object
